nodes.text: A B1-Series battle droid was used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars, serving Poggle the Lesser.

During the Second Battle of Geonosis, he and another B1 Battle droid commanded the Confederacies newest war machine,the Super Tank against the Republic forces. He and the other B1 Battle Droid commented on the new tank's armor and weaponry, saying that they are supperior to the Republic's war machines by not being able to pearce though their armor. Later the two battle droids fired several shells towards the Clone troopers, killing or wounding many of them. He and the other battle droid were destroyed when Anakin Skywalker and Luminara Unduli destroyed the bridge where the Tanks were advancing.
